weapons.description: Give them a friendly scratch or snack and they'll drop <EmphA>Milk</>. When assigned to a <EmphA>Barn</>, Mountain Cows will produce even more items depending on what theyre fed. When eliminated they will drop <EmphA>Meat</>.

weapons.name: Chicken
weapons.description: Give them a friendly scratch or snack and they'll drop <EmphA>Eggs</>. When assigned to a <EmphA>Barn</>, Chickens will produce even more items depending on what they're fed. When eliminated they may drop <EmphA>Feathers</> or <EmphA>Meat</>.

weapons.name: Cow
weapons.description: Give them a friendly scratch or snack and they'll drop <EmphA>Milk</>. When assigned to a <EmphA>Barn</>, Cows will produce even more items depending on what theyre fed. When eliminated they will drop <EmphA>Meat</>.

weapons.name: Sand Wolf
weapons.description: Pack-hunters that will circle you before they attack. Not even the desert heat can slow them down.

weapons.name: Hermit Crab
weapons.description: Watch where you walk on the beach, they tend to pinch to protect their surfy-turf.

weapons.name: Ram
weapons.description: Give them a friendly scratch or snack and they'll drop <EmphA>Heavy Wool</>. When assigned to a <EmphA>Barn</>, Rams will produce even more items depending on what theyre fed. When eliminated they will drop <EmphA>Meat</>.

weapons.name: Stone Roller
weapons.description: Watch for their charged attacks -- they're VERY quick on their feet.

weapons.name: Sand Roller
weapons.description: Projectile-throwing desert-dwellers. They're fast and get sand EVERYWHERE!

weapons.name: Frost Roller
weapons.description: Be prepared for their charge attacks. These snow crabs DO NOT know the meaning of the word "chill."

weapons.name: Scorpion
weapons.description: The tiny kings of stings, known for surprising their prey with vicious piercing attacks.

weapons.name: Frost Scorpion
weapons.description: Stingy and slushy, these ice-hunters like to surprise their prey from snowdrifts.

weapons.name: Sand Scorpion
weapons.description: Don't get splashed by their acid. These desert-roamers know how to defend their toasty turf.

weapons.name: Sheep
weapons.description: Give them a friendly scratch or snack and they'll drop <EmphA>Wool</>. When assigned to a <EmphA>Barn</>, Sheep will produce even more items depending on what theyre fed. When eliminated they will drop <EmphA>Meat</>.

weapons.name: Bone Wolf
weapons.description: Undead canines that hunt in packs. If you hear them howling at the moon... RUN! It is said the bones of this creature are durable, yet light and are perfect for <EmphA>upgrading gear</>.

weapons.name: Frost Wolf
weapons.description: Cold-hearted hunters that roam in packs. Are those icicles... or more teeth?!

weapons.name: Spider
weapons.description: Will hide under rocks and attack with eight tiny legs when you least expect it! This pest drops items that would be useful to put in the <EmphA>Loom</>.

weapons.name: Frost Spider
weapons.description: Arctic arachnids who love to hide in snowdrifts before they attack. This pest drops items that would be useful to put in the <EmphA>Loom</>.

weapons.name: Sand Spider
weapons.description: Watch your step... they like to hide in the sand and surprise their prey. This pest drops items that would be useful to put in the <EmphA>Loom</>.

weapons.name: Wild Wolf
